description.narrative: General question: Results related to the intended outcome 2013Question: Summarise results related to the intended outcome (this information will be sent to Open Aid)Answer: The intended outcome of LGDG was to create a substantial and predictable flow of unearmarked funding to LGAs to finance their respective annual development plans. By and large, this has not worked as intended: the flows have been less than planned and budgeted, what is forwarded comes in quarterly installments without predictability which enables planning and implementation of local contracts for service delivery. In many cases, the funds also come with strings attached, for example to build roads or schools although not part of the local development plan which the grants were supposed to be used for.
